rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0001
rows.name: So, Rook, feel like you're starting to get the hang of things?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: xs03090100_SEL0011
rows.name: Show confidence.

rows.label: xs03090100_JNK0020
rows.name: Shake Your Head

rows.label: xs03090100_SEL0021
rows.name: Show hesitation.

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0002
rows.name: Course you are![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0003
rows.name:
You've taken to it like a fish to water—
just like Elma and the Commander said you would.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Just the same, let's review the key points,
and I can fill in some extra details.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0005
rows.name: Course not, you just started.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0006
rows.name:
All right, well, why don't we review the key points then,
and I can fill in some details.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0007
rows.name:
BLADE's top priority right now is to
secure missing pieces of the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0008
rows.name: You remember that much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Countless people are frozen in the Lifehold—
it's the key to restoring humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Up until we ran into the Prone,[ST:page p1=40 ]our biggest concern was that wild indigens
would stumble on the Lifehold and damage it somehow...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0011
rows.name:
But now, there's a more pressing threat—
intelligent alien races who are intentionally trying to destroy us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0012
rows.name: So our search has new urgency...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0013
rows.name: We need to find and retrieve all of the Lifehold ASAP.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0014
rows.name:
And the best way to do that is by
expanding the reach of FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0015
rows.name:
The more probes we can install, the wider we can scan,
and the faster we can find bits of the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0016
rows.name:
So our primary focus going forward should be
to travel around Mira installing data probes—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0017
rows.name:
as many as we can, as fast as we can.
I can't stress enough how important this is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0018
rows.name: You still with me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_JNK0030
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: xs03090100_SEL0031
rows.name: Assure Elma you understand.

rows.label: xs03090100_JNK0040
rows.name: Cock Your Head

rows.label: xs03090100_SEL0041
rows.name: Look confused.

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Good. Then let's move on to the other pressing threat
that BLADE has to deal with:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0020
rows.name: Okay, once more from the top, then:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0021
rows.name: Hostile indigens. There's no real delicate way to put this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0022
rows.name: Any wildlife that poses a clear threat must be eliminated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0023
rows.name: The Lifehold is our future, but we can't ignore the present.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0024
rows.name: We still have our duty to keep New LA safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0025
rows.name:
And sometimes that duty requires enacting coordinated
strikes to solve problems before they can do real harm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0026
rows.name:
We're the newcomers here, it's true—
and they're usually just out to defend their territory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0027
rows.name:
But sometimes it really is them or us.
And we have to make sure it's us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0028
rows.name:
Don't get me wrong—it's not like we run out there
and light up anything that moves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0029
rows.name: Only BLADE HQ can choose targets,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0030
rows.name:
and they tend to keep them strictly to creatures
that pose a significant threat to our survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0031
rows.name:
In order to contribute to this cause, operatives are asked
to form into squads to take on special missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0032
rows.name:
These Squad Missions, as we call them, don't get posted to 
Mission Control like your other, more typical assignments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0033
rows.name:
Rather, HQ transmits the details
directly to all of us at the same time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0034
rows.name:
Basically, they want as many people to know
about them ASAP, so they can be taken care of ASAP.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0035
rows.name:
I'm sure you can imagine, but these missions
aren't your run-of-the-mill little fetch quests.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0036
rows.name:
It's not the kind of stuff just one or two BLADEs
could handle on their own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0037
rows.name: That's why squads can have as many as 32 members.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0038
rows.name:
And it's why we ask members to sign up
to a squad beforehand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0039
rows.name:
We can't have BLADEs playing musical chairs
whenever this kind of emergency hits us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0040
rows.name: But just remember:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0041
rows.name:
Squad Missions are not mandatory. You don't have
to drop everything you're doing just to take one on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0042
rows.name:
HQ has no way of knowing what every BLADE
is up to when these missions arise.[ST:page p1=150 ]If you're busy with something else, they'll understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0043
rows.name:
They need to trust our collective judgment
with these things, and...well, so far, so good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0044
rows.name: Aaand I think that about covers the basics, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0045
rows.name: Search for the missing pieces of the Lifehold...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0045_2
rows.name: Install data probes to expand FrontierNav...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0046
rows.name: and take on Squad Missions when you can to keep us safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0047
rows.name: Got all that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_JNK0050
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: xs03090100_SEL0051
rows.name: Show you understand.

rows.label: xs03090100_JNK0060
rows.name: Look Confused

rows.label: xs03090100_SEL0061
rows.name: Show you're completely lost.

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0048
rows.name: Good. We're counting on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0049
rows.name: Aaand briefing adjourned! Thank God.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0050
rows.name: All right—we'll go over it as many times as it takes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0051
rows.name: All right, well, it's getting pretty late, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0052
rows.name: Yeah, let's call it a night.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0053
rows.name: Oh, Tatsu so excited to sleep in real bed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0054
rows.name: Linly can show Tatsu to his room now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0055
rows.name: Oh, your room is right over there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0056
rows.name:
Oh-ho! It look perfect size for Tatsu...
Wait! What?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0057
rows.name: Tatsu know what that is![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0058
rows.name:
That ruh-fridger-eater!
Food go in there to cool off![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0059
rows.name: Heh, I guess you ARE smarter than you look...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0060
rows.name: Well, Tatsu not want to brag, but—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03090100_MSG0061
rows.name: Wait a minute! Tatsu see what Linly did there.[ST:wait ]
